N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 517.2 - Legal base

State Regulations
(a) Sections
7.09
and
31.04
of
the Mental Hygiene Law grant the Commissioner of Mental Health the power and
responsibility to adopt regulations that are necessary and proper to implement
matters under the commissioner's jurisdiction. (b) Section
29.11
of
the Mental Hygiene Law authorizes the Commissioner of Mental Health to order or
approve the transfer of a patient from one facility, as defined in section
1.03
of the

Mental Hygiene Law, to another appropriate facility. This same section
authorizes the commissioner to arrange for the interim or emergency
accommodation of patients. (c) Section
29.01
of
the Mental Hygiene Law grants the Commissioner of Mental Health the authority
to adopt regulations governing admissions to hospitals and to prescribe and
furnish forms for use in procedures for admission. Notes
